participant_1.background:
I do my best to be a good parent, but it's not always easy.
i cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.
my favorite food is spaghetti and meatballs.
I'm always spilling drinks on myself at the beach, but I love it anyway.
I want to have more fun with my siblings.

participant_2.background:
I have a laptop that is perfect for my outdoor activities.
I want to ride my horse at full speed across the open plain to feel the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
i have many homes.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.

content.text: It's going great! I just got back from a horseback riding trip and I'm feeling really refreshed.
That sounds amazing! I love horseback riding. What's your favorite part about it?
I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I know what you mean! I love that feeling too. I also love the challenge of riding a horse. It can be really difficult, but it's so rewarding when you get it right.
Exactly! It's a great workout too. I always feel like I've gotten a good workout after a long ride.
Me too! I love that I can get some exercise and have fun at the same time.
Me too! I'm so glad we both love horseback riding.
Me too! It's one of the best things ever.
I'm glad you had a great time on your trip.
Thanks! I'm glad I got to share it with you.
